property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets the Alien and Hunter races. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution, non-light Angel Command creatures from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever you put a creature that has "Blocker" into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {THRILLING THREE}: Dragon (When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Dragon revealed, use the following Thrilling Three ability once. Then put the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.) }: {THRILLING THREE}This creature breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.
